name: Borderlands: Zombie Island of Dr. Ned
name_original: Borderlands: Zombie Island of Dr. Ned
description:
Borderlands: Zombie Island of Dr. Ned is an action-shooter game developed by Gearbox Software. It came out on 24-11-2009. It was published by 2K Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Borderlands: Zombie Island of Dr. Ned is available on PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
